title: Science Instructional Design Leveraging Productive Failure (PF) Effects in Computer-Supported Collaborative Learning (CSCL)

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science education methodologies and collaborative learning experience
context.additional_context: Science Problem-Solving Course Applying the PF Teaching Method in a Smartphone-Based CSCL Environment for Pre-Service/In-Service Teachers. Operated with a Focus on Formative Assessment

learning_goals: Learners can solve unstructured scientific problems by applying the PF (Problem-Based) teaching method in CSCL (Computer-Supported Collaborative Learning) environments
Learners can sustain diverse discussions in collaborative problem-solving processes using Facebook and discussion forums
Learners can derive at least three teachable strategies applicable to future science classes through PF (Problem-Based) experiences

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
